sentences.sContent: He decided to devote the rest of his life to scientific investigation.
sentences.sCn: 他决定把余生奉献给科学研究。

remMethod.val: de+vot (发誓)+e→发誓效忠祖国→奉献

words.tran: 虔诚的，祷告的；信仰的；献身的
献身于…；致力于…（devote的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 奉献； 致力； 专心
trans.tranOther: to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone
